scripts.build:dev: bash -lc "npm run build || { echo '[error] Build failed; copy skipped.'; exit 1; }; bash copy_paste.sh dev && echo '[info] Build succeeded; dev copy complete.'"
scripts.build:staging: bash -lc "npm run build || { echo '[error] Build failed; copy skipped.'; exit 1; }; bash copy_paste.sh staging && echo '[info] Build succeeded; staging copy complete.'"
scripts.build:prod: bash -lc "npm run build || { echo '[error] Build failed; copy skipped.'; exit 1; }; bash copy_paste.sh prod && echo '[info] Build succeeded; prod copy complete.'"
